name: Bmelgren&unchained-a(spinningrainmix)
milkdrop_raw:
[preset00]
fGammaAdj=2.000000
fDecay=0.980000
fVideoEchoZoom=1.006596
fVideoEchoAlpha=0.000000
nVideoEchoOrientation=1
nWaveMode=5
bAdditiveWaves=0
bWaveDots=0
bModWaveAlphaByVolume=0
bMaximizeWaveColor=1
bTexWrap=1
bDarkenCenter=0
bMotionVectorsOn=0
bRedBlueStereo=0
nMotionVectorsX=12
nMotionVectorsY=9
bBrighten=0
bDarken=0
bSolarize=0
bInvert=0
fWaveAlpha=0.800000
fWaveScale=1.184300
fWaveSmoothing=0.750000
fWaveParam=-0.200000
fModWaveAlphaStart=0.750000
fModWaveAlphaEnd=0.950000
fWarpAnimSpeed=1.000000
fWarpScale=1.000000
fZoomExponent=1.000000
fShader=1.000000
zoom=1.072135
rot=0.040000
cx=0.500000
cy=0.500000
dx=0.000000
dy=0.000000
warp=1.000000
sx=1.000000
sy=1.000000
wave_r=0.500000
wave_g=0.500000
wave_b=0.500000
wave_x=0.500000
wave_y=0.500000
per_frame_1=warp = 0;
per_frame_2=wave_r = wave_r + .33*sin(time);
per_frame_3=wave_g = wave_g + .33*sin(time*.888);
per_frame_4=wave_b = wave_g + .33*sin(time*.999);
per_frame_5=wave_mystery=wave_mystery+.3*sin(time*.888);
per_pixel_1=fleem=if(above(bass_att,1),-5,10)+if(above(treb_att,1),10,-5);
per_pixel_2=zoom = zoom + .05*tan(ang*fleem+pow(abs(rad-2),4)+time/2-rad);
fRating=5.000000
